001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
005import java.util.function.BiFunction;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import com.commercetools.api.models.ResourceUpdate;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
011
012public interface RetryHandler<TResult> {
013    CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<TResult>> execute();
014
015    static <T extends BodyApiMethod<T, TResult, TBody>, TResult, TBody extends ResourceUpdate<TBody, ?, TBuilder>, TBuilder extends Builder<TBody>> RequestCommand<TResult> concurrentModification(
016            T request, Function<TBody, TBuilder> builderCopyFn, BiFunction<TBuilder, Long, TBuilder> updateFn) {
017        return new ConcurrentModificationRetryHandler<>(request, builderCopyFn, updateFn);
018    }
019}
